resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.

fields.description:
Hi ,

i am able to ping on the tcp://172.16.26.30:61626 (one of the property added in the Resource Adapter Config as server url and able to Ping on from the Connector Connection Pool )

if i am using the failover protocol with the other server not able to ping 


failover://(tcp://172.16.26.30:61626,tcp:172.16.26.30:61616)?initialReconnectDelay=100&maxReconnectDelay=30000&random=false&maxReconnectAttempts=3

[2015-05-27T15:16:49.872+0530] [glassfish 4.1] [INFO] [ra.stop-successful] [javax.enterprise.resource.resourceadapter.com.sun.enterprise.connectors.service] [tid: _ThreadID=465 _ThreadName=pool-137-thread-1] [timeMillis: 1432720009872] [levelValue: 800] [[
  RAR7094: activemq-rar-5.11.1 shutdown successful.]]

[2015-05-27T15:16:54.201+0530] [glassfish 4.1] [WARNING] [test.connection.pool.failed] [javax.enterprise.resource.resourceadapter.com.sun.enterprise.connectors.service] [tid: _ThreadID=326 _ThreadName=admin-listener(12)] [timeMillis: 1432720014201] [levelValue: 900] [[
  RAR8054: Exception while creating an unpooled [test] connection for pool [ jms/ActiveMqConnectionFactory1 ], Could not create connection.]]

[2015-05-27T15:16:29.283+0530] [glassfish 4.1] [SEVERE] [] [org.glassfish.admingui] [tid: _ThreadID=323 _ThreadName=admin-listener(9)] [timeMillis: 1432719989283] [levelValue: 1000] [[
  RestResponse.getResponse() gives FAILURE.  endpoint = 'http://localhost:60880/management/domain/resources/ping-connection-pool'; attrs = '{id=jms/ActiveMqConnectionFactory1}']]

[2015-05-27T15:16:36.176+0530] [glassfish 4.1] [INFO] [ra.stop-successful] [javax.enterprise.resource.resourceadapter.com.sun.enterprise.connectors.service] [tid: _ThreadID=478 _ThreadName=pool-145-thread-1] [timeMillis: 1432719996176] [levelValue: 800] [[
  RAR7094: activemq-rar-5.11.1 shutdown successful.]]

[2015-05-27T15:16:39.102+0530] [glassfish 4.1] [WARNING] [test.connection.pool.failed] [javax.enterprise.resource.resourceadapter.com.sun.enterprise.connectors.service] [tid: _ThreadID=323 _ThreadName=admin-listener(9)] [timeMillis: 1432719999102] [levelValue: 900] [[
  RAR8054: Exception while creating an unpooled [test] connection for pool [ jms/ActiveMqConnectionFactory1 ], Could not create connection.]]

[2015-05-27T15:16:54.201+0530] [glassfish 4.1] [WARNING] [test.connection.pool.failed] [javax.enterprise.resource.resourceadapter.com.sun.enterprise.connectors.service] [tid: _ThreadID=326 _ThreadName=admin-listener(12)] [timeMillis: 1432720014201] [levelValue: 900] [[

comments.body: There's not enough information here to show any bugs on the broker, could just be bad configuration.
